abstractText: Correction to: Nature Medicine https://doi.org/10.1038/s41591-022-01862-8, published online 17 June 2022. In the version of this article initially published, the first affiliation listed for Leonard A. Levin, now reading “Department of Ophthalmology and Visual Sciences, McGill University, Montreal, Quebec, Canada,” originally listed the wrong location (Madison, WI, USA), and has now been corrected in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.

sections.text:
NAture MediciNe | VOL 28 | OCTOBER 2022 | 2216–2219 | www.nature.com/naturemedicine2218
Correction to: Nature Medicine https://doi.org/10.1038/s41591-022-01862-8, published online 17 June 2022. In the version of this article initially published, the first affiliation listed for Leonard A. Levin, now reading “Department of Ophthalmology and Visual Sciences, McGill University, Montreal, Quebec, Canada,” originally listed the wrong location (Madison, WI, USA), and has now been corrected in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
Published online: 9 August 2022 https://doi.org/10.1038/s41591-022-01996-9
© Springer Nature America, Inc. 2022
Publisher Correction: State-dependent responses to intracranial brain stimulation in a patient with depression Katherine W. Scangos , Ghassan S. Makhoul, Leo P. Sugrue, Edward F. Chang and Andrew D. Krystal
Correction to: Nature Medicine https://doi.org/10.1038/s41591-020-01175-8, published online 18 January 2021. In the version of this article initially published, the Methods section was missing. The Methods section is now included in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
Published online: 8 August 2022 https://doi.org/10.1038/s41591-022-01950-9
© The Author(s), under exclusive licence to Springer Nature America, Inc. 2022
Publisher Correction: Reporting guideline for the early-stage clinical evaluation of decision support systems driven by artificial intelligence: DECIDE-AI Baptiste Vasey , Myura Nagendran, Bruce Campbell, David A. Clifton, Gary S. Collins , Spiros Denaxas, Alastair K. Denniston , Livia Faes, Bart Geerts, Mudathir Ibrahim , Xiaoxuan Liu, Bilal A. Mateen , Piyush Mathur, Melissa D. McCradden , Lauren Morgan, Johan Ordish , Campbell Rogers , Suchi Saria, Daniel S. W. Ting, Peter Watkinson , Wim Weber , Peter Wheatstone, Peter McCulloch and the DECIDE-AI expert group*
Correction to: Nature Medicine https://doi.org/10.1038/s41591-022-01772-9, published online 18 May 2022. In the version of this article initially published, a list of the DECIDE-AI expert group members and their affiliations was omitted and has now been included in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
*A list of authors and their affiliations appears online.
Published online: 12 August 2022 https://doi.org/10.1038/s41591-022-01951-8
© The Author(s), under exclusive licence to Springer Nature America, Inc. 2022

title: Author Correction: Regenerative and restorative medicine for eye disease
